bug.author: wobu
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gitter>@gitter</denchmark-link> channel i was told this configuration is just some leftover and can be removed Nevertheless libraries shouldn't deliver an application.conf. In my case this conflicts somehow with the application.conf in my test scope and the test cases, which uses akka, are failing.

comments.comment: Actually we should remove akka dependency, since there should be nothing relying on it anymore.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
